channel.title: electrical engineering on stemformulas
channel.description: Recent content in electrical engineering on stemformulas

item.title: Shockley Diode Model
item.description: The Shockley diode model is a simplified model of a diode’s Voltage-Current relationship.

item.title: Ohm's Law
item.description: Ohm’s law states that the current through a conductor between two points is directly proportional to the voltage across the two points.
